评论概述: Felt great, but ripped only 2 months after buying
评论详情: These are an alright cheap alternative to "work sneakers" like Cole Haan or Peter Millar. I wore them most work days and started noticing weird creases that would bubble up. I wore them to the airport, and when I got to my destination, there were multiple tears in the outer shell. It's a shoe with a thin leather wrapping around it, and the wrapping is what tore. Just spend a bit more and get some genuine leather shoes that will last.

评论概述: Definitely worth the money. Best shoes I've found for the money.
评论详情: I needed some work/office shoes where it's business casual. These fit the bill. Available in half sizes, wide widths, AND in smaller sizes which are super hard to find (I wear a men's 6.5W). I love the look and feel of skate shoes that can still pull off semi-formal dress code. They're also very lightweight. They came packaged better than some kicks 3x their price. Also included were some good quality extra laces which is awesome. The only 2 things that I would improve upon is more cushion and more arch support in the insole and I wish these were real leather for breathability and longevity. Bought for the fall season so I haven't had any issues yet with breathability but synthetic uppers are always hotter than leather in the heat and less insulating in the cold. I usually end up putting an orthotic insole in all my shoes, anyway, typically after wearing the shoes for a couple of weeks, so the insole isn't a deal breaker at all. Some might care though. So yeah leather and a better insole for which I would happily pay double for these what they're going for now (which is excellent pricing for the current economy with the current materials). Want these in dark brown as well. Or forest green, please!
Great shoe so far!!! Would buy again.
